title: Defines the term "auxiliary police officer"
summary: Defines the term "auxiliary police officer" to mean a member of an auxiliary police organization authorized pursuant to constituting the New York state defense emergency act or a member of an auxiliary police organization trained by the police department with which the auxiliary police organization is associated, who bears the title auxiliary police officer and serves without compensation.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to definition of auxiliary police officer
